articles.author: Chris Welch
articles.title: Sonos announces redesigned app that puts everything on your homescreen - The Verge
articles.description: Sonos will release a major update to its mobile app on May 7th. The company will also phase out its desktop apps in favor of a web app that allows for remote system control.
articles.content:
